lead_paragraph: Dunga might still be coach of Brazil if video replay technology had been used at the Copa America in June.

headline.print_headline: Video Replays Not Intended to Wipe Out All Refereeing Mistakes
headline.main: Video Replays Not Intended to Wipe Out All Refereeing Mistakes
